title: Anyone else getting this bug?
body: So for some reason recently ive been playing and i will be up against a random champ and their auto attacks will deal insane amounts of dmg, like level one a shen did around 340 in one auto no abilities apart from passive then qd me and i died, i thought i goofed but realize no champ does that much lvl 1 auto, and it has kept occuring with other champions, e.g. renekton lvl 3 auto literally 1 hit kills but in death recap it comes up with random letters and numbers and has my entire hp amount in it and is pictureless?? now i understand league is a buggy game but has anyone else had this happen? whats the deal?

replies.body:
Can you provide an image of the death recap for others to take a look at?

I haven't experienced this myself on OCE nor NA and I've been playing for a few years now. The closest experience I can recall to this would be this little exploit involving BotRK.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IEDD4ro-ztI
